data.name: On my own: A Hot Isekai Adventure
data.detailed_description:
CHECK OUT OTHER GAMES

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1907630/Beauties_Academy__Spellcraft_Tournament/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1872580/Ghostly_Moans/


About the Game



During a religious ritual performed only by men, something goes wrong and they ended up disappearing.

To bring them back, the witch Hecate starts a powerful ritual but she ends up making a mistake and an unexpected man is summoned.

Now, a young and shy boy named Ryo sees himself in a fantastic place surrounded by dangers but also full of beauties, magicians, and thieves. Will he return home or choose to stay in this new world?

Features


  • Classic JRPG;
  • 4 Unique Playable Characters;
  • Party System;
  • Immersive World;
  • Side Quests;

data.short_description: A powerful ritual made all the men in a village disappear. When a powerful witch tries to bring them back, she ends up making a mistake and an unexpected man is summoned. Will he be able to survive in an unknown world full of beautiful women and full of dangers?
data.supported_languages: English, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or Better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 Capable GPU
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
